name: Fathoms Found
description:
In Fathoms Found, The player is tasked to pilot a space drone on an unknown planet far from earth, as part of a space program to find planets suitable to support human life. 

Your job is to research and explore your environment, and fulfill a list of tasks given to you by the company you work for. You will do this using your two main tools, your sampler gun and your grabber claw.

As you create samples using your sampler gun you can move, compare and identify materials to gain knowledge about the planet around you and solve puzzles using this knowledge and these materials.

During your travels, you will encounter a mysterious alien species, which will react to your presence based on your actions. To progress on your way to complete all your tasks, you will have to learn to communicate with them through hand gestures, either by force or with compassion.

By exploring and doing their assigned tasks, the player will also slowly uncover the history of this planet and the alien species residing on it, figuring out what happened and why things have become the way they are now.
